text: huwar wella awata p ra deshaye deshagunaya itha unusum wu athara dahawal kalane faranhayid 119.9 (selsiyas 48.8) uparima dakwa da wiya.

- shri lankawe thirasara sanwardhana aramunu sakshath karaganima sandaha tharunayin sawibala ganwime aramunin janadhipathi karyalaye 'thirasara sanwardhana anshaya' mangin 'shri lankawe thirasara sanwardhana aramunu sakshath kirima sandaha wagakimen, mulikathwaya ganimata, nayakthawa kusalatha samangin, tharunayin sawibala ganwime wyapruthiya' namin wadasatahanak pradhana adiyara 03k yatathe kriyathmaka kirimatath, ee sandaha awashya prathipadana 2019 - 2021 madhyakalina ayawaya ramuwa yatathe salasa ganimatath athigaru janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mathithuma idiripath kala yojanawa amathya mandalaya wisin anumatha karana ladi.
